entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 0 near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning late in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 16 January 2023
